scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes both text and image-based exhibit content as well as announcements, flyers, and newspaper reports about exhibits that Wilkinson created based in her research. There are three main exhibit topics represented in this series. Forgotten Pioneers: Black Physicians in Lexington from 1890-1950; The Afro-American Presence in Medicine (focusing on Harvard and England); and exhibitions on women: Celebrating the power of Creativity: African American Women from 1750-1950 and Warriors in the Shadows: Women of the Underground Railroad.
